name: Tack Shooter
inGameDesc: Shoots a short range volley of sharp tacks in 8 directions.
target:
None
First, Last, Close, Strong with Inferno Ring

path1.name: Faster Shooting
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots tacks faster.
Effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown). Blade Maelstrom ability gains +40 pierce, and Super Maelstrom ability gains +100 pierce.

path1.name: Even Faster Shooting
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots tacks even faster.
Effect: Attacks an additional +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown). Blade Maelstrom ability gains a further +40 pierce (for a total of +80), and Super Maelstrom ability gains a further +100 pierce (for a total of +200).

path1.name: Hot Shots
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots superhot tacks that do extra damage and can pop Lead Bloons.
Effect: Pops Frozen and Lead, tacks deal +1 damage and attacks +20% faster

path1.name: Ring of Fire
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Damages many more Bloons with a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks.
Effect: Instead of tacks, creates bursts of flame that deal 5 damage per shot against up to 30 bloons. Attacks +100% faster (0.315s attack cooldown) but can no longer pop Purples.

path1.name: Inferno Ring
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Deadly inferno of flame roasts Bloons into oblivion.
Effect: Powerful bursts of flame deal 8 damage, plus an extra +4 damage to MOAB-class, and attacks much faster. Range is increased from 23 to 35. Also creates explosive burning meteors that deal 700 damage each onto a specific target, creating an explosion that sets bloons on fire, dealing 50 damage per second.

path2.name: Long Range Tacks
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Tacks fly out further than normal.
Effect: Adds +4 range and increases projectile speed.

path2.name: Super Range Tacks
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Even longer range tacks that can pop more Bloons.
Effect: Adds +1 pierce and another +4 range. Ring of Fire and Inferno Ring add +15 pierce to their main attack, and Inferno Ring's meteor gets an additional +1 pierce. The Tack Zone receives +6 pierce and +16 range instead of the default stat increases.

path2.name: Blade Shooter
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Switches tacks out for sharp blades that can pop up to 5 additional Bloons.
Effect: Instead of tacks, shoots sharp blades that pop up to 8 bloons instead of 2. Blades have larger hitboxes.

path2.name: Blade Maelstrom
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Blade Maelstrom ability: Covers the area in a storm of blades.
Effect: Ability distributes two waves of blades in a clockwise direction for 3 seconds. Ability can be sped up slightly.

path2.name: Super Maelstrom
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Even more powerful Maelstrom ability and lasts longer.
Effect: Ability distributes four waves of higher damage blades in a clockwise direction for 9 seconds. Can pop Frozen and Lead. Ability can also be sped up slightly.

path3.name: More Tacks
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots 10 tacks instead of 8, plus increases Ring of Fire damage.
Effect: Shoots 10 tacks per shot instead of 8. Ring of Fire gains +1 damage instead of more tacks. Blade Maelstrom ability fires blades counter-clockwise instead of clockwise and lasts 0.5 seconds longer. Super Maelstrom ability lasts 1.5 seconds longer.

path3.name: Even More Tacks
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots out 12 tacks per shot and increases Ring of Fire damage further.
Effect: Shoots 12 tacks per shot instead of 10. Ring of Fire gains an extra +1 damage (total +2). Blade Maelstrom ability duration increased by a further 0.5 seconds. Super Maelstrom ability duration increased by a further 1.5 seconds.

path3.name: Tack Sprayer
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Sprays out 16 tacks per volley.
Effect: Shoots 16 tacks per shot and attacks +33% faster.

path3.name: Overdrive
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots incredibly fast.
Effect: 3x attack speed and +1 pierce.

path3.name: The Tack Zone
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Many, many tacks.
Effect: Shoots 32 tacks per shot, and attacks +54% faster than before (x0.65 attack cooldown). Adds +7 range and does extra damage per shot to MOAB-Class Bloons.
